item.title: Wheel of numerone's fortune [Various Games]
item.itunes:title: Wheel of numerone's fortune [Various Games]
item.itunes:author: numerone
item.itunes:summary:
Wheel of numerone's fortune
(Various Games)
wheel of numerone's fortune material
A fortune discover game for windows and linux in avalonia dialect material of Google. This project does not use the google's xaml stylesheet, but use the reactive ui of avalonia (it's read multitrheaded)·
The use case

The game is a family game to play together, to get to know English, so imagine you and your partner playing "guess the English sentence" and she shouts "as so long, not is so long".

This is the registered motto.

For installing in on windows you need the dotnet desktop runtime 9 (the latest version of 9), and for installing it on debian based systems you ned the repository of microsoft for downloading the dotnet framework.

More info can be find on the OpenCode readme.
[read more]

item.title: ChessMD [Chess]
item.itunes:title: ChessMD [Chess]
item.itunes:author: danxu876
item.itunes:summary:
ChessMD
(Chess)
Improve your game with unlimited game review, interactive engine analysis, and several other state-of-the-art training utilities developed by chess masters.
Features:

- Adaptive Bot Play: Engage with computer opponents of varying strengths to refine your tactics.

- Engine-Based Game Analysis: Evaluate your games using your preferred chess engine for deeper insights.

- Move-by-Move Review: Receive detailed feedback on each move to assess accuracy and decision-making.

- Opening Explorer: Study openings in depth by navigating through complete chess databases.

- Chess.com Game Import: Seamlessly analyze your own games by importing them directly from Chess.com.
[read more]

item.title: RosarioSIS [Education Apps]
item.itunes:title: RosarioSIS [Education Apps]
item.itunes:author: francoisj
item.itunes:summary:
RosarioSIS
(Education Apps)
RosarioSIS is a Student Information System designed for school management and communication.
It runs in the browser as a web application powered by PHP/SQL.
Main modules are: School, Students, Users, Scheduling, Grades, Attendance, Discipline, Food Service and Student Billing.
Numerous add-ons (modules, plugins and themes) are available. For example: Email, SMS, Messaging, Library, Hostel, Inventory, Students Import...
RosarioSIS features a responsive interface, multilingual support, PDF reports, list export to Excel, colorful statistical charts, online student registration.
A demo is available on the official website.
[read more]

item.title: AAAAXY [Jump N Run]
item.itunes:title: AAAAXY [Jump N Run]
item.itunes:author: divverent
item.itunes:summary:
AAAAXY
(Jump N Run)
AAAAXY is a nonlinear 2D puzzle platformer taking place in impossible spaces.
Although your general goal is reaching the surprising end of the game, you are encouraged to set your own goals while playing. Exploration will be rewarded, and secrets await you!

So jump and run around, and enjoy losing your sense of orientation in this World of Wicked Weirdness. Find out what Van Vlijmen will make you do. Pick a path, get inside a Klein Bottle, recognize some memes, and by all means: don't look up.

And beware of a minor amount of trolling.

To reach the end, a new player will take about 4 to 6 hours, a full playthrough can be finished in about 1 hour and the end can be reached in about 15 minutes.
[read more]

item.title: renameUsingExif [Graphic Apps]
item.itunes:title: renameUsingExif [Graphic Apps]
item.itunes:author: posktomten
item.itunes:summary:
renameUsingExif
(Graphic Apps)
The AppImage Updates itself,
you only need to download once.

Read more
https://gitlab.com/posktomten/renameusingexif/-/wikis/home

1181 supported cameras
https://bin.ceicer.com/renameusingexif/suport_for_cameras.php

Rename files and create folders
Organize Photos with Date and Time Folders and File names Automatically organize your photos
by creating a folder structure and renaming files based on the date and time they were taken.
To customize the folder structure and filename format,
click "Settings" and then "Settings"

Correct Image Date and Time
This feature corrects inaccurate date and time information in your image files
by using the time difference between your camera's clock and the actual date and time.
It can efficiently process a large number of files.
To use this feature, click "Correct Image Date and Time..." and then enter "Enter your camera's incorrect date and time..." and "Correct camera's incorrect date and time..."

EXIF Tags
Leaving the filter empty will display all EXIF tags.
You can filter the displayed tags to show only those that contain specific strings.
Example: To show tags containing "Photo", enter "Photo" in the filter.
You can combine multiple filters by separating them with a semicolon (;).
Example: To show tags containing either "Photo" or "Thumbnail", enter "Photo; Thumbnail".
The filter is case-insensitive, meaning uppercase and lowercase letters are treated the same.
To use the EXIF data reader, click "Read EXIF data" and then "Open an image file..."


[read more]

item.title: Fingrom [Financial]
item.itunes:title: Fingrom [Financial]
item.itunes:author: vlyskouski
item.itunes:summary:
Fingrom
(Financial)
The goal of the solution is to create a financial accounting application that is intuitive, efficient, and inclusive.
That empowers users to effortlessly manage their finances while ensuring that no one is left behind.

Features:
- Accounting
- Budget Categories
- Bills, Transfers, Incomes (Invoices)
- Goals Definition
- Recurring Payments
- Exchange rates
- Metrics
- Filtering
- Budget Category assumption / prediction for Bills
- Synchronization between devices (P2P)
- Recovery via WebDav or a direct File
- Import from CSV, QIF, OFX files for Bills and Invoices
- Export to XLSX (Excel)
- Data encryption
- Localization
- Responsive and Adaptive Design
- Shortcuts

If you would like to come with suggestions, report bugs, translate the app, or contribute otherwise, feel free to reach out!

This is the "open-source code" application that welcomes and values contributions from the community. However, there are some limitations when it comes to making external modifications and distributions, as it follows the CC-BY-NC-ND-4.0 license. As the project's author, I am committed to upholding the "Terms of Use" and "Privacy Policy" to ensure the well-being and satisfaction of all users across all platforms (desktop, mobile, and web).
[read more]

item.title: Qmmp [Audioplayers]
item.itunes:title: Qmmp [Audioplayers]
item.itunes:author: trialuser
item.itunes:summary:
Qmmp
(Audioplayers)
Qmmp (Qt-based Multimedia Player) is an audio-player, written with help of Qt library.
[b]Supported operating systems:[/b]
GNU/Linux
FreeBSD
Microsoft Windows

[b]Supported formats:[/b]
MPEG1 layer 2/3
Ogg Vorbis
Ogg Opus
Native FLAC, Ogg FLAC
Musepack
WavePack
tracker modules (mod, s3m, it, xm, etc)
ADTS AAC
CD Audio
WMA, Monkey's Audio (and other formats provided by FFmpeg library)
PCM WAVE (and other formats provided by libsndfile library)
midi
SID
chiptune formats (AY, GBS, GYM, HES, KSS, NSF, NSFE, SAP, SPC, VGM, VGZ, VTX)

[b]DSP effects:[/b]
BS2B effect
sample rate converter
LADSPA effects
extra stereo
crossfade

[b]Visual effects:[/b]
projectM visualization
spectrum analyzer

[b]Output system support:[/b]
OSS4 (FreeBSD)
ALSA (Linux)
Pulse Audio
JACK
WaveOut (Win32)
DirectSound (Win32)
WASAPI (Win32)

[b]Other features:[/b]
XMMS and Winamp 2.x skins support
alternative user interface based on standard widgets set
10-band equalizer
MP3, Vorbis, AAC, AAC+ streams support
MPRIS
removable device detection (via UDisks)
video playback via Mplayer
lyrics
cover art support
CUE sheet support
embedded CUE support (for FLAC, WavPack and Monkey's Audio)
multiple playlists
automatic charset detection for cue files and ShoutCast metadata
playlist formats: m3u, pls, xspf
ReplayGain support
sending listening history to Last.fm, Libre.fm and ListenBrainz
CDDB support
audio converter
stream browser
audio formats conveter
external programs execution on track change
ReplayGain scanner
archive reader (RAR and 7z)
audio recording
listening history
media library

[b]Downloads[/b]
[url]https://qmmp.ylsoftware.com/downloads.php[/url]
[url]https://sourceforge.net/projects/qmmp-dev/files/[/url]
[read more]
